SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
F/V NUEVO GOLONDRINA REPORTS CREWMAN REQUIRING
MEDICAL ASSISTANCE IN 15-44.80S 022-39.12W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC MADRID,
PHONE: 349 1755 9132, 349 1755 9133,
FAX: 349 1526 1440,
E-MAIL: CNCS@SASEMAR.ES.
